de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.collections

Class CollectionResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.collections.CollectionResource

  • @Path(value="/collections")
public class CollectionResource
extends java.lang.Object
    IIIF REST resource providing a collection object as defined in the IIIF presentation api

      CollectionResource()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection generateCollection(java.lang.String collectionField, java.lang.String topElement, java.lang.String url, java.util.Locale locale, java.lang.String facetField) 
      java.lang.String getBaseUrl() 
      Collection getCollection(java.lang.String language, java.lang.String collectionField, java.lang.String topElement)
      Returns a iiif collection of the given topCollection for the give collection field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the direct child collections.
      Collection getCollections(java.lang.String language, java.lang.String collectionField)
      Returns a iiif collection of all collections from the given solr-field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the topmost collections.
      CollectionView getCollectionView(java.lang.String collectionField, java.lang.String facetField)

    • Method Detail

      • getCollections

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{language}/{collectionField}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Collection getCollections(@PathParam(value="language")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String language,
                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="collectionField")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String collectionField)
                                                                                                                  throws PresentationException,
                                                                                                                         IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                         java.net.MalformedURLException
        Returns a iiif collection of all collections from the given solr-field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the topmost collections. Child collections may be accessed following the links in the @id properties in the member-collections Requires passing a language to set the language for all metadata values
        Parameters:
        language -
        collectionField -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • getCollection

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{language}/{collectionField}/{topElement}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Collection getCollection(@PathParam(value="language")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String language,
                                                                                                                                     @PathParam(value="collectionField")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String collectionField,
                                                                                                                                     @PathParam(value="topElement")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String topElement)
                                                                                                                              throws IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                                     java.net.MalformedURLException
        Returns a iiif collection of the given topCollection for the give collection field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the direct child collections. Collections further down the hierarchy may be accessed following the links in the @id properties in the member-collections Requires passing a language to set the language for all metadata values
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
